goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a red object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.3: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
rules.4: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
